title: Generator Page
description: A dynamic generator with custom inputs meant for beginning developers leaning the DOM api. It's a low level project meant to develop Javascript skills, while the site itself is mean for comedic reasons.

title: Single Price Grid Component
description: A responsive single price grid component. This Project had two phases and i moved on after the first meaning this is a desktop only version.

title: QR Code Component
description: A simple QR code component. Built simply to warm up for a larger project or class a morning

title: Blog Preview Card
description: A preview card for blog posts. another warm up project

title: Testimonials Grid Section
description: A grid layout for testimonials. this was meant to teach me flexbox and grid, however i used flexbox and learned grid later.

title: Product Preview Card
description: A preview card for products. another warm up project before class.
